price: 28. Markaad ku dul fadhiisataan adiga iyo kuwaa ku wehliyaba doonnida, dheh: “Ammaan idilkeed iyo mahad waxaa leh Alle, ee naga babaadiyey qoloda daalimiinta (gar ma qaatayaasha) ah.
arabic: فَإِذَا ٱسۡتَوَيۡتَ أَنتَ وَمَن مَّعَكَ عَلَى ٱلۡفُلۡكِ فَقُلِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي نَجَّىٰنَا مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā is'tawayta anta waman maʿaka ʿalā al-ful'ki faquli al-ḥamdu lillahi alladhī najjānā mina al-qawmi al-ẓālimīna
